messages.message:
Bit of feedback on clicking the  *Last run status link* 
   https://zoom.us/clips/share/71OQhoyizFWIFxEGlPR0onfpg1Cst8ZXHO3DPPB3W3sRCnLQpklqnmpg31Ww3NaXvAd9dbWj4BLCedTv57T0Otz2.nT3-iAGw5g7Da3qw
Passcode: %Zy9?Amz


@andy

CC: @Udit on what we just talked about

@hannah any suggestions on how to solve this from a product usability perspective?

the quick fix is probably to remove the default completed filter when there is a run_id in the url that someone links out to. That way they always see the docs in that case.

This will resolve itself for most cases when there is auto-resume on since there will not be a state where the runs table says review required since the entire run will be resumed immediately if all docs are reviewed
Yes I think that's likely the best solution for now too
